title: After all the injuries and losses, Bueckers and UConn complete storybook journey
description: After four years of disappointment, Paige Bueckers finally lived her -- and UConn's -- dream come true.
author: Alexa Philippou

title: 'Masterful' UConn cruises to 12th national title
description: It had been nine long years since UConn won an NCAA tournament, and the Huskies played like it on Sunday, authoring a dominant 82-59 performance over South Carolina in Tampa and securing the 12th national championship under coach Geno Auriemma.
author: Michael Voepel

title: 'One of dullest derbies' shows major change needed in Manchester
description: After Man City and Man Utd played out a dull goalless Premier League draw, BBC Sport looks at what is ahead of both clubs.

title: Liverpool title push hits a bump - but when can they win it?
description: Liverpool's march to the Premier League title seems inevitable despite blip at Fulham. When could they be confirmed as champions?

title: Verstappen fends off Norris, Piastri to win Japanese GP
description: Max Verstappen fended off Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri to claim his first victory of the 2025 Formula 1 season in a tense finish to the Japanese Grand Prix.

title: Slot: People will make stories but our errors were one-offs
description: Liverpool boss Arne Slot said people would "make stories" out of the reasons for his side's 3-2 defeat at Fulham but played down the defensive mistakes in their first Premier League loss since September.

title: Golden State Warriors jersey history - No. 10 - Joe Fulks (1946-54)
description: During his time suiting up for the Warriors, Fulks wore only jersey No. 10 and put up 16.4 points, 5.3 rebounds, and 1.2 assists per game.

title: OKC Thunder jersey history No. 22 - Cason Wallace (2023-25)
description: During his time suiting up for the Thunder, Wallace wore only jersey No. 22 and put up 7.5 points, 2.8 rebounds, 2.0 assists, and 1.3 steals per game.
